greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Sum over all partitions of n of the product of the number of parts and the number of distinct parts.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
maple: b:= proc(n, i, p, d) option remember; `if`(n=0, d*p, `if`(i<1, 0,
mathematica: a /@ Range[0, 50] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Mar 09 2021, after _Alois P. Heinz_ *)
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, Nov 18 2020
